article_metadata.description: The move to make the healthcare system a digital-first industry as Uber and Lyft have done for U.S. transportation will trigger a quadrupling to $1 billion the projected venture capital investment in on-demand health products this year. A new report from Accenture says on-demand healthcare investment will grow from $250 million [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
